db:abstract.db:para: The User type identifies a user who contributed a particular Place content item.
This type was introduced in QtLocation 5.5.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Each Place content item has an associated user who contributed the content. This type provides information about that user.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: The following example shows how to display information about the user who submitted an editorial:

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the name of a user.

db:section.db:title: user : QPlaceUser
db:section.db:para: For details on how to use this property to interface between C++ and QML see "Interfaces between C++ and QML Code".

db:section.db:title: userId : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the unique identifier of the user.
